N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 82-1.4 - Request for a hearing

State Regulations

Where the employee desires a hearing, he or she may file
a written request for a hearing with the clerk or secretary of the employing
board within 10 days of receipt of the charges, and where the charges concern
pedagogical incompetence or issues involving pedagogical judgment, the employee
shall choose either a single hearing officer or a three member panel. In the
request for a hearing, the employee may designate an attorney who will
represent the employee at the hearing and who shall be authorized to receive
correspondence from the commissioner pertaining to the 3020-a proceeding on his
or her behalf. Notes
